algorithm_technique: Iterative pairing using a list, simulating tournament rounds.
problem_summary_simple: Generate a string representing tournament matches for n teams, pairing strongest with weakest.
problem_summary_technical: Iteratively pairs teams from the ends of a list, creating nested string representations of matches.
key_insights: The core idea is to simulate the tournament round by round.
In each round, the strongest remaining team is paired with the weakest remaining team.
The process continues until only one match remains, representing the final winner.
